GameDescription.Tictactoedescription: Classic game to get 3 of your player in a row.
GameDescription.mancaladescription: Get the most marbles on your side.
GameDescription.connect4description: Get 4 pieces in a row before your opponent.
GameDescription.othellodescription: End with more pieces than your opponent.
GameDescription.chopsticksdescription: Make your opponent lose all their chopsticks.
